main event: A UFO was reported on March 9, 1957, by a pilot and co-pilot during a Pan American Airlines flight over the Atlantic.
interesting points: Multiple pilots from different flights reported seeing the same object, which was described as a bright greenish-white light,. It was originally thought to be a jet interceptor due to its proximity and brightness, but further analysis ruled this out,The object observed was estimated to be about airplane size and was on a potential collision course, prompting evasive maneuvers,. Crew and passengers aboard the flight experienced panic during the evasive action, resulting in injuries,The phenomenon was investigated, with some experts suggesting it may have been a bolide or meteoric fireball.
witness description: pilots from Pan American Airlines and other flights
